name: Train-Fic (WIP)
description:
For my first game on TIC-80, I want to make a simulation game were you have to manage the train trafic.

I'm actualy hard working on it, so if you have some suggestion, please leave it on the comment tab!

If you want to play it on the TIC-80 website, you can play it here

You can see the devlog on my website
